Title: Taming the Tempest
Description: You hear a fierce and militant voice roaring in the distance. A crackling storm swells and swirls around a clouded, shadowy figure. Lightning flashes and No'ku Stormsayer appears, his scornful gaze aimed directly at you.
PortraitGiverText: Tendrils of lightning arc from No'ku's feet as he passes through the courtyard.
